title: The Pearls of Coromandel
description: John Sugden joined the Indian Civil Service in order to begin his career in the British government. But the days of the Raj are Gandhi and Jinnah are rallying their nationalist followers against the English, while Muslims and Hindus battle each other.Sugden flouts tradition by falling in love with Kamala, whose father would rather see her die than marry into the Raj. And the lovers must flee for their lives...The Pearls of Coromandel is a novel of love and trust set during the tumultuous decline of the British Raj in India.
author: Keron Bhattacharya
